English:
Wh-Wh-What's going on?!
Or better yet, wh-wh-what are we going to do?!
Chinese:
現現現現在是怎麼樣！？
是說，該該該該怎麼辦呢！？
Korean:
어어어어떻게 된 거야!?
그보다, 어어어어쩌면 좋은 거야!?
German:
W-W-Was passiert jetzt?!
Und vor allem, w-was machen wir?!

English:
Eek!
Wh-Wh-What's going on?! A blackout?
Chinese:
呀！？
怎、怎麼了怎麼了！？停、停電！？
German:
Huch!
W-Was ist los?! Ein Stromausfall?

English:
Oh yeah! Arata and his buds were going to cut the
power!
Chinese:
啊，是這樣啊！
是新他們把電源給關掉了！！
Korean:
아, 그렇구나!
아라타 일행이 전원을 내렸구나!!
German:
Ach ja! Arata und seine Kumpel wollten ja den
Strom kappen!
